titlePage.note: Individual title pages for each text.

msItem.title: Hálfs saga og Hálfsrekka
Hálfs saga ok Hálfsrekka
msItem.rubric: Sogu þattur af Alfe konge og Reckum hanns
msItem.incipit: Alfrekur hiet kongur er bio a Alfrekstodum
msItem.explicit: Yri hiet dottir hanns og er þadann mikil ætt kominn

msItem.title: Hrómundar saga Gripssonar
msItem.incipit: Sa kongur riede fyrer Gordum, er Olafur hiet
msItem.explicit: Eru af þeim komnar konga ætter og kappar mikler
msItem.finalRubric: Og lykur hier svo sogu Hromunds Greypssonar

msItem.title: Hálfdanar saga Brönufóstra
msItem.incipit: Hringur er kongur nefndur, hann rieþi fyrir Danmork
msItem.explicit: sa sem feck dottur Bronu, varþ kongur i Danmark
msItem.finalRubric: Ok lykur her sogu Halfdanar Bronufostra

msItem.title: Hrólfs saga kraka
msItem.incipit: Frode kongur drepur Halfdan broþur sin
msItem.explicit: og finn haugur handa hvorium kappanna og nockur vopn hia
msItem.finalRubric: og endar hier sogu Hrolfs kongs kraka og kappa hanns

additions.p: Provenance note at the foot of fol. 2r: Skjenket skolebibliotheket af Hr. Schaldemose. Pages ruled in pencil.

binding.p: Restored half-calf over paper boards with marbled (green and brown) design. Fore-edges painted green. Gilted floral patterns at head and foot of spine along with gilt tooled image of an urn. Title tooled into spine: SOGUBOK ALFE 3 HROLFE 3 &c

origin.note: Probably written some time around 1816 or 1817, the dates given in other manuscripts of the same collection (e.g. AM Acc. 52 and AM Acc. 57).

provenance.p: Given as a gift to the Nykøbing Katedralskole in 1816 by Frederik Schaldemose. Acquired from the school by the AMS in April 2007 as a gift. Library sticker from the school on the foot of the spine.
